name: Its_A_Vans "Mask Masquerade"
description:
Hi, I'm Istvan (AKA Its_A_Van)

I made a small stealth game where you sneak through a small snippet of Venice, picking up better masks along the way to aid in detection to be able to reach the final "Golden Masquerade Mask" at the end of the level.  

All of the game was made by me including the art and programming (most of which I wouldn't be proud of if it weren't for the timeframe)

Many things didn't get done but I might continue this in my own time. I hope you enjoy. Feedback is ALWAYS welcome :)
